org.hsqldb
Class WebServer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.hsqldb.WebServer
public class WebServer
extends java.lang.Object

WebServer acts as an HTTP server and is one way of using the client / server mode of HSQL Database Engine. This server can deliver static files and can also process database queries. An applet will need only the JDBC classes to access the database. The WebServer can be configured with the file 'webserver.properties'. This is an example of the file: 

 server.port=80
 server.database=test
 server.root=./
 server.default_page=index.html
 server.silent=true

 .htm=text/html
 .html=text/html
 .txt=text/plain
 .gif=image/gif
 .class=application/octet-stream
 .jpg=image/jpeg
 .jgep=image/jpeg
 .zip=application/x-zip-compressed
Root: use / as separator even for DOS/Windows, it will be replaced
Mime-types: file ending must be lowercase
